title: Do u guys think a Zed skin will come out in the "FUTURE" or neeeehhh ??

replies.body: lmao of course they're going to release a skin for a champ that's either pick or ban almost every game.
Sona got an ultimate skin and she wasn't even close to being banned and she was far from a top pick for support, pick/ban rate does not determine if they release a skin for said champion.

> [{quoted}](name=NigguhDamus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ebnhv2Uk,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-11T02:09:41.783+0000)
>
> Sona got an ultimate skin and she wasn't even close to being banned and she was far from a top pick for support, pick/ban rate does not determine if they release a skin for said champion.

yeah, of course it doesn't determine it. it does have an affect on it though.
OP just wants a Zed skin :P
why are there quotation marks around future? Anyway, zed is quite a beloved mid laner played by many and no doubt he will have a new skin in the foreseeable future
